answers.answer: Hi there!Chronic uncontrolled diabetes could be a possible cause of distal axonal polyneuropathy while the spinal changes described would result in proximal issues. I would suggest consulting a neurologist for suggestion of an accurate management plan at this time.Hope this information is helpful.Take care!
